q2: Hello,Barcelona has been a powerhouse for awhile in football. They almost seem like a dynasty and always get good soccer players. Does anyone know how many championships they have won in their history? I am passionate about soccer and have enjoyed Barcelona here in the states. Buying much clothes from online. Who is everyones favorite player on the team?
a3: I support Chelsea, so Barcelona is a rival when we are decent. I don't follow La Liga.
